item.description:
What: Hastings House @ Beverly Farms Fundraiser for a new Heating System

When: Saturday, Oct 15,2011 8pm-midnight

Entertainment: Don't Call Me Shirley

Cost: $10.00pp includes Appetizers, Music, Dancing and a whole lot of fun. Tickets will be sold at the door.

Please remember to bring the Meetup Cell phone number (978-304-2811) in case your are running late, get lost or can not find us.

 

Also, if you haven't paid your dues this year, please consider doing so at this event.

 

Hope to see you all at Hastings House

Janet & Donna
item.name: Hastings House Fundraiser with DCMS
